column5: My home is comfortable and happy with a gorgeous view and nice backyard. It's fully furnished you're welcome to use everything in my home. It's a three bedroom home with two bathrooms and you will be able to use the bedroom and bathroom on one side of the home. I will be available at all times to answer any questions you may have. The home is 15 minutes from the airport, 15 minutes from Gruene where the famous green Hall is. Also New Braunfels and many many other attractions that I can share with you.
